fields.seoDescription: Oops! The page you’re looking for couldn’t be found. Check your link or navigate back to discover our helpful content.
fields.intro:
Just like in life, we sometimes encounter detours that redirect us to new paths. Let’s make this moment an opportunity to move forward.

You can:
- [Return to the homepage](/)
- [Learn more about me and my approach](/about)
- [Contact me for support](/contact)

> Take a deep breath, and let’s keep navigating this journey together.
fields.content:
## Still Stuck?

If you’re finding yourself here often, don’t hesitate to reach out. I’d love to help you find what you’re looking for—or perhaps we can use this as the first step toward something new.

Here’s how to get in touch:

- **Email**: [eleni@mikrouli.nl](mailto:eleni@mikrouli.nl)
- **Phone**: 00 31 6 19 44 62 63
- **Languages**: Greek, Dutch, English

Or, [schedule a session directly](/contact). 

> Together, we can start creating clarity and positive change.

fields.title: About
fields.seoDescription: Learn about Eleni, a systemic therapist with an international perspective dedicated to helping clients build healthier relationships.
fields.intro: I’m Eleni Papamikrouli, a systemic therapist working with individuals, couples, and families. Originally from Greece, I’ve been living, studying, and working in the Netherlands since 2007. My own experience of adapting to new environments and navigating change has shaped how I approach therapy—with curiosity, openness, and a deep respect for each person’s unique story.
fields.content:
## About My Practice  
Mikrouli is more than just a therapy practice—it’s a space for **exploration, growth, and connection.** The name reflects a **personal and thoughtful approach**, where we look at your life in a way that **honors both the details and the bigger picture.**  

My goal is to create a warm, safe, and non-judgmental environment where you can feel heard and understood. Whether you’re seeking therapy for yourself, your relationship, or your family, we work together to explore what’s happening and how to create meaningful change.  

---

## About Me  
I have always been drawn to understanding people—their stories, relationships, and the ways they navigate life’s complexities. My journey into systemic therapy was shaped by this curiosity and a deep belief that **healing happens in connection—with ourselves, with others, and with the systems we are part of.**  

Originally from Greece, I began my studies in psychology in Athens before moving to the Netherlands in 2007 to pursue a master’s degree in health psychology. It was during this time that I discovered **systemic therapy—a perspective that felt deeply aligned with my values of empathy, collaboration, and relational understanding.** Instead of focusing on individuals in isolation, systemic therapy explores the broader dynamics that shape our experiences, creating space for meaningful change.  

### My Experience and Approach  
Over the years, I’ve trained in systemic therapy in both the Netherlands and Greece, gaining insight into **diverse ways of working with individuals, couples, and families.** My approach is thoughtful, practical, and collaborative—I don’t provide quick fixes or one-size-fits-all solutions, but instead, help clients explore possibilities, gain clarity, and find ways forward that truly fit their lives.  

As an expat myself, I also understand the impact of cultural transitions and the interplay between personal identity and the environments we live in. While my work is not limited to international clients, this experience has given me **a deep appreciation for how change, belonging, and adaptation influence well-being.**  

Beyond my therapy practice, I am also involved with a non-profit organization that supports adult children of parents with psychological challenges or addictions. This work has reinforced my belief in **the power of resilience, the importance of breaking generational patterns, and the possibility of rewriting our stories in ways that feel more empowering and connected.**  

### Life Outside of Therapy  
Outside of my practice, I’m a mother to a wonderful 7-year-old daughter, a role that continues to **shape my perspective on relationships, growth, and the everyday challenges of balancing personal and professional life.** Parenthood has taught me that we are always learning, adapting, and discovering new aspects of ourselves—something I bring into my work with clients as well.  

Therapy, to me, is a **space for reflection, exploration, and transformation**—not about becoming someone different, but about becoming more yourself in a way that feels authentic and meaningful.  

---

## My Approach to Therapy  
Therapy isn’t about finding quick fixes or rigid solutions—it’s about discovering **what works for you.** My approach is:  

- **Collaborative** – We explore your challenges together. You’re the expert in your own life, and I help you uncover insights and possibilities.  
- **Practical** – Change isn’t just about talking—it’s about taking small, meaningful steps forward in ways that feel manageable.  
- **Curious and Compassionate** – Therapy is a space to **reflect without judgment** and see your situation with fresh eyes.  

I don’t believe in a one-size-fits-all approach. Every person, couple, and family is different, and together, we find a way of working that fits your unique needs.  

---

## Why Systemic Therapy?  
Systemic therapy looks beyond the individual and focuses on the **relationships, patterns, and environments** that shape our experiences. Instead of seeing challenges as isolated problems, we explore:  

- **How relationships influence emotions and behaviors.**  
- **What patterns keep repeating, and why?**  
- **Where small shifts can create meaningful change.**  

This approach is **not about blame—it’s about understanding.** We work to uncover new perspectives, recognize strengths, and build solutions that feel sustainable.  

Systemic therapy is useful for **personal growth, improving relationships, and navigating major life transitions**. It helps make sense of emotions and behaviors in a way that feels connected to your life as a whole, rather than just focusing on “fixing” individual struggles.  

---

## Therapy as a Journey  
Growth doesn’t happen all at once—it happens through small steps, insights, and shifts in perspective. Therapy provides the time and space to **understand yourself better, explore possibilities, and move forward in a way that feels right for you.**  

Whether you’re facing a specific challenge or simply seeking more clarity, therapy can offer support, guidance, and a new way of seeing things. You don’t have to go through it alone.
fields.outro:
## Taking the First Step  
Starting therapy is a personal decision, and it’s normal to have questions before making that choice.  

I offer a **free 15-minute intake session** where we can talk about what’s on your mind, explore whether my approach feels like the right fit, and discuss how therapy might support you. There’s no commitment—just an opportunity to take the first step at your own pace.

fields.title: Blog
fields.seoDescription: Read insightful articles offering tools and perspectives to navigate life’s challenges and foster personal growth for individuals and families.
fields.intro: Therapy is about understanding ourselves and the systems we live in. Whether you're an international, an expat, or simply someone navigating life’s challenges, these articles offer insights and tools to support your journey.
fields.content: You'll discover concise, insightful articles that offer practical tools and fresh perspectives—whether you're an international, an expat, or simply navigating life's challenges. Each post is designed to empower you with the clarity and strategies you need for personal growth.

fields.title: Contact
fields.seoDescription: Reach out for accessible therapy support. Contact me to begin your journey toward personal change and well-being.
fields.seoKeywords: system therapy, contact, support, counseling, healing
fields.header: Contact Me to Take the First Step
fields.intro: Taking the first step toward therapy can feel daunting, but I’m here to make it as simple as possible. Whether you’re curious about the process or ready to begin, I’d love to hear from you.
fields.content:
## Get in Touch  
Taking the first step toward therapy can feel like a big decision, but you don’t have to do it alone. Whether you’re ready to begin or simply have questions, I welcome you to reach out. Therapy is a collaborative process, and our first conversation is a space for you to explore whether this feels like the right fit.  

I offer a **free 15-minute intake session**, where we can talk about what’s on your mind, discuss how therapy might support you, and answer any questions you may have—without any pressure or commitment.  

---

## Contact Details  
- **Email:** [eleni@mikrouli.nl](mailto:eleni@mikrouli.nl)  
- **Phone:** [00 31 6 19 44 62 63](tel:+31619446263)  
- **Languages:** Greek, Dutch, English  
- **Sessions:** Online only  

If you’d like to schedule a session or have any questions, feel free to reach out by **email or phone.** I aim to respond as soon as possible to ensure you get the support you need.  

---

## What to Expect When You Reach Out  
Reaching out for therapy can sometimes feel like a big step. Here’s what happens after you contact me:  

### **1. Free 15-Minute Intake**  
Our first conversation is a chance to get to know each other. You can share a bit about what brings you to therapy, ask any questions, and get a sense of how we might work together.  

### **2. Scheduling a Session**  
If we decide to move forward, we will schedule an online session at a time that works for you. Since all sessions take place online, you can **access therapy from anywhere** in a way that fits into your life.  

### **3. Preparing for Your First Session**  
In our first session, we will explore your needs, expectations, and hopes for therapy. There is no pressure to have everything figured out—this is simply a space to start the conversation.  

---

## Fees and Practical Information  
Understanding the logistics of therapy can help you feel more comfortable about getting started.  

- **Session Length:** Typically 50 minutes  
- **Session Type:** Online video calls  
- **Payment Options:** Details provided upon booking  

If you have any questions about fees or practical arrangements, feel free to reach out—I’m happy to provide more information.  

---

## Accessibility and Confidentiality  
Your privacy and comfort are important. All sessions are held in a **secure, confidential** online setting, ensuring you can speak openly and feel fully supported.  

I strive to make therapy as accessible as possible. If you have any specific concerns or accessibility needs, please let me know—I’m happy to discuss how we can accommodate them.
fields.outro:
## Ready to Take the First Step?  
If you’re considering therapy but aren’t sure where to start, a **free 15-minute intake session** is a simple way to explore your options.  

Feel free to send me an **email** or give me a **call**—there’s no pressure, just an opportunity to see if therapy feels like the right step for you.

fields.title: Home
fields.seoDescription: Mikrouli systemic therapy is supportive space for clarity and positive change and navigate life’s challenges.
fields.seoKeywords: therapy, positive change, clarity, support, systemic
fields.header: Creating Positive Change in Your Relationships and Life
fields.intro:
Life can feel complicated, whether you’re navigating relationships, work challenges, or cultural transitions. 

I’m Eleni Papamikrouli, a systemic therapist working with individuals, couples, and families. While I specialize in supporting internationals and expats, I welcome anyone seeking clarity and connection in their life.

sections.title: Your Journey Starts Here
sections.content:
Therapy is an opportunity to **gain clarity, explore patterns, and create meaningful change.** Whether you're feeling stuck, overwhelmed, or simply curious about self-growth, I offer a safe, supportive space to help you navigate your personal journey.  

> No matter where you are in your journey, therapy is a place to reflect, grow, and move forward in a way that feels right for you.  

As a systemic therapist, I focus on how relationships, past experiences, and environments shape our lives. Together, we work **not to "fix" problems, but to understand them in a way that leads to new possibilities.**

{{ link url="/services" text="Explore my services" variant="primary"}}

sections.title: My Approach
sections.content:
I’m **Eleni Papamikrouli**, a systemic therapist with a background in psychology and health psychology. Originally from Greece, I’ve lived in the Netherlands since 2007, where I’ve worked with individuals, couples, and families from diverse backgrounds.  

My approach is **collaborative, practical, and grounded in curiosity.** I help clients explore the patterns that shape their experiences, offering new perspectives and actionable strategies to create lasting change.  

I believe therapy is not about "fixing"—it’s about gaining insight, discovering strengths, and developing ways to live in alignment with your values.  

{{ link url="/about" text="Learn more about me" variant="primary"}}

sections.title: Ready to get in touch?
sections.content:
Taking the first step toward therapy or counseling can feel like a big decision, but you don’t have to do it alone. Whether you're exploring therapy for personal growth, relationship support, family dynamics, or parenting guidance, I’m here to help.  

I offer a **free 15-minute intake session**, where we can talk about what’s on your mind, answer your questions, and see if this feels like the right fit for you. This is a space for you to share your concerns, get a sense of how I work, and explore what you hope to gain from therapy or counseling—without any pressure or commitment.  

All sessions take place **online**, making it easy to access support in a way that fits into your life. If you’re ready to start the conversation, I welcome you to reach out.  

{{ link url="/contact" text="Get in touch" variant="primary"}}

sections.title: Insights & Reflections
sections.content:
Growth doesn’t only happen in therapy—it happens in the moments of self-reflection, in the conversations we have, and in the ways we begin to see things differently.  

I regularly share thoughts, insights, and resources on **systemic therapy, relationships, parenting, and personal development**. My blog is a space where you can explore different perspectives, find practical tools, and gain a deeper understanding of the patterns that shape our lives.  

Whether you're looking for guidance, reassurance, or simply curious about different approaches to mental and emotional well-being, the blog is a great place to start.  

{{ link url="/blog" text="Explore my blog" variant="primary"}}

sections.title: Taking the first step
sections.content:
Therapy is an investment in yourself, your relationships, and your future. Wherever you are in your journey, I invite you to explore, reflect, and take the next step at your own pace.  

If you’re ready to begin, I’m here to support you. Let’s start the conversation.

fields.title: Reviews
fields.seoDescription: Discover how systemic therapy with Eleni at Mikrouli has transformed lives. Read heartfelt reviews from clients who found clarity, healing, and growth.
fields.intro:
At Mikrouli, we believe that every journey of healing and self-discovery is unique. Through systemic therapy, Eleni has helped individuals and families uncover deep-rooted patterns, heal past wounds, and create meaningful change in their lives.

We are honored to share the experiences of those who have trusted Eleni with their personal growth. Their heartfelt words reflect the transformative impact of her guidance and the safe, nurturing space she provides.

Read their stories below and see how systemic therapy can bring clarity, empowerment, and healing.
fields.content:
## Share Your Experience with Mikrouli

Your journey matters to us. If you’ve had a session with Eleni and would like to share your experience, we would be truly grateful for your feedback.
We believe that every story has the power to inspire and help others on their own path.

For now, you can send your review via email, and we will carefully include it on our website. Your review can be anonymous if you prefer—just mention it in your message.

{{link url="mailto:hello@mikrouli.nl?subject=Review%20for%20Systemic%20Therapy%20at%20Mikrouli&body=Dear%20Eleni,%0A%0AI%20would%20like%20to%20share%20my%20experience%20with%20systemic%20therapy%20at%20Mikrouli.%20Here%20are%20my%20review%20details:%0A%0A-%20**Reviewer%20Name**%20(or%20write%20Anonymous):%20%0A-%20**Age**%20(optional):%20%0A-%20**Nationality**%20(optional):%20%0A-%20**Review**:%20%0A-%20**Rating**%20(1-10):%20%0A%0AI%20understand%20that%20my%20review%20may%20be%20shared%20on%20the%20Mikrouli%20website,%20and%20I%20confirm%20whether%20I%20want%20to%20remain%20anonymous." text="Mail your experience" variant="primary"}}

> We are also in the process of integrating Trustpilot to make it even easier for you to leave a review in the future. Until then, we deeply appreciate your time and words.

Thank you for being part of our journey.

fields.title: Services
fields.seoDescription: Discover tailored therapy services to improve relationships, overcome challenges, and support personal growth for clients from all walks of life.
fields.header: Explore Ways We Can Work Together
fields.intro: I provide therapy for anyone seeking to improve their relationships, navigate challenges, or better understand themselves. While I bring a unique perspective to working with internationals and expats, my services are open to all who want to create positive change.
fields.content:
## Discover Our Approach

We believe that every individual’s journey is unique, and effective therapy should honor your personal story while offering practical tools to create positive change.

Our services are designed with flexibility and empathy in mind. Whether you're looking to improve your relationships, overcome personal challenges, or simply gain clarity about your life direction, our tailored approach supports your growth every step of the way.
